account.punchout.configuration.descripti: Specify the return values of the OCI Punchout transfer format for your procurement system.
account.punchout.configuration.form.head: Parameter name
Format
Mapping
Parameter value
account.punchout.configuration.form.tool:
The data mapping allows values to be assigned individually to the configuration. The field values are mapped from the external Punchout catalog to your procurement system. Please note the following:
  • A mapping rule can only be entered for fields with a parameter value.
  • A mapping rule must always have a "from" and a "to" value, otherwise it will not be saved.
  • If multiple mapping rules exist, only the first matching rule will be applied. Chaining rules is not possible.
  • A rule is only applied once within a string.
  • An asterisk (*) matches any number of characters, e.g. 2345* = 23450000.

search.noresult.guidelines:
Search tips & guidelines

  1. Double-check the spelling. Try varying the spelling or browse our lists of product categories that appear on our homepage.
  2. Limit the search to one or two terms.
  3. Be less specific in your terminology. Using (a) more general term(s) is likely to lead you to similar and related products.
